quote: The biggest cause of divorse in my opinion is marriage
author: Paul V. Walters

quote: Divorce is never a pleasant experience. You look upon it as a failure. But I learned to be a different person once we broke up. Sometimes you learn more from failure than you do from success.
author: Michael Crawford

quote: On marriage: You sort of stumble along and reconnect and lose each other and reconnect again.
author: Felicity Huffman

quote: Memory Timeline of Divorce Divorce +1 year: "Just because we don't talk, it doesn't mean I can't stop thinking about you."Divorce +10 years: "The one good thing that came out of our marriage was our wonderful children."Divorce +20 year: "Who? Doesn't ring a bell.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The snag about marriage is, it isn´t worth the divorce.
author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce

quote: Happy wife, happy life.
author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Love and Blindness [10w] Love may be unilaterally blind,but divorce blinds both parties.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Disagreements over money are the biggest cause of divorce."She waved her hand. "Absolutely no problem. Your money is our money. My money is my money."She wrote away."I should make you negotiate with Phoebe.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  Match Me If You Can

quote: Marriage becomes hard work once you have poured the entirety of your life’s expectations for happiness into the hands of one mere person. Keeping that going is hard work.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: [Marriage] happens as with cages: the birds without despair to get in, and those within despair of getting out.
author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
author: Voltaire

quote: Marriage is nothing but a commitment to care and share.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Paying alimony is like feeding hay to a dead horse.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: Husband: a man with hopes of being a lover who settles for being a provider, causing his wife to grow suspicious of her depleting jewelry box.
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: A happy wife is a happy life.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: Marriage is the death of hope.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A break up is the closest thing to bereavement
author: Lindsey Kelk,  I Heart New York

quote: When a man finds the woman he really loves, the one he respects and wants to call wife, there is nothing on earth he won't do for her. No mountain he won't hike. No river he won't wade. No door he won't open. She is Eve and there's not a snake crawling that can keep them apart.
author: Yolanda Joe

quote: You have to fight for your marriage, do whatever it takes. The commitment has to be there. And if you don't have a sense of humor, I don't know how anybody makes it.
author: Kay Robertson

quote: You know that we've got a few problems we need to talk through before we get married.""I'm not getting rid of Pooh.""See, there you go being antagonistic. Marriage means learning to compromise.""I didn't say I wouldn't compromise. I promise to take the ribbon out of her topknot before you walk her.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  It Had to Be You

quote: Madelyne, we're married now. 'Tis a usual occurrence to bed one's wife on the wedding night.
author: Julie Garwood,  Honor's Splendour

quote: We are often insane with happiness. We are also very unhappy for reasons neither of us can do anything about. Like being separated.
author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife

quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the wedding cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: I was with book, as a woman is with child.
author: C.S. Lewis,  Till We Have Faces

quote: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Love without reason; forgive without judging.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I think of how each person in a marriage owes it to the other to find individual happiness, even in a shared life. That this is the only way to grow together, instead of apart.
author: Emily Giffin,  Heart of the Matter

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: In marriage, each partner is to be an encourager rather than a critic; a forgiver rather than a collector of hurts; an enabler rather than a reformer.
author: H. Norman Wright

quote: Marriage is the union of two 'I's to form a 'V'. Both 'I's have to tilt equally to make a good 'V'. 'I's standing tall can never make a 'V'.
author: Ashok Kallarakkal

quote: Marriage [10w] The only thing better than forgiveness in marriage is forgetfulness.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: She seemed to think that one of the perks of marriage was that it gave you rights of comment and intrusion over single people's love lives.
author: J.K. Rowling,  The Casual Vacancy

quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: Bachelorhood: all the fun of married life and more prosperity, leaving lots of descendants to boast of their father’s memory to their fellow inmates.
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: If you have the woman you love, what more do you need? Well, besides an alibi for the time of her husband’s murder.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Dysfunctional Love We split up not because he or she didn't love us,but because they did love us in the only way they knew how.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: My life really began when I married my husband.
author: Nancy Reagan

quote: That there's no more important decision in life than who you marry.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Marriage isn't about Winning - It's about Lasting
author: Mark Gorman

quote: Every couple has ups and downs, every couple argues, and that’s the thing—you’re a couple, and couples can’t function without trust.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  At First Sight

quote: You may lose your wife, you may lose your dog, your mother may hate you. None of those things matter. What matters is that you achieve success and become free. Then you can do whatever you like.
author: Kevin O'Leary
